author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Galatasaray Says News About Company Restructuring Debt Of 2.55 Bln Lira Does Not Reflect The Truth
text:
May 10 (Reuters) - GALATASARAY:
* SAYS NEWS ABOUT COMPANY RESTRUCTURING DEBT OF 2.55 BILLION LIRA DOES NOT REFLECT THE TRUTH
* AS DISCUSSED IN MEETING, PLANNED RESTRUCTURES ARE ABOUT SYNDICATED LOANS FROM BANKS
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
